title: How many books does Amazon have for sale? - Quora

response.answer_text: Regarding physical books, I never called Amazon or tried to check the figures, but I imagine that Amazon sells a lot of physical books that they don't even have (through third parties) in their warehouse. Also, they seem to keep track of sales of books beyond their catalog because I've seen a book with the ranking number past 8 million; I can't remember the title but I never saw another ranking this low. [Update, May 31, 2015]I saw another book with an even lower ranking, almost 13 million!"Harlan Ellison's Chocolate Alphabet (AKA From A to Z in theChocolate Alphabet)"
